text:
W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
DIVISION OF EDUCATION
HUGH B. MASTERS
DIRECTOR
September 15, 1952
ROBERT G. Van DUYN
ASSOCIATE DIRECTOR
Mr. Graydon Ausmus
WUOA, University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Mr. Ausmus:
We have spent considerable time in reviewing some possible
names to suggest to you and your committee for the Executive
Secretary of NAEB. I regret to inform you that we have not
been able to come up with any additional names other than the
ones that Bob VanDuyn suggested to you the other afternoon
while you and Wilbur Schramm were visiting with us.
The two people I had in mind, after further investigation and
study, I do not believe are the people that we should recomÂ¬
mend to you for consideration. If we think of any names in
the next day or two, we shall be glad to send them to you.
I wish you a lot of success in your undertaking.
Please take good care of the camellias. I hope to have the
opportunity of seeing them sometime.
Sincerely,
Hugh Masters
HBM:ees
